title: APPE-based Instructional Design Program for Strengthening Pharmacy Education Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical curriculum design competencies for pharmaceutical education managers/leaders within organizations.

learning_goals: Learners can apply APPE module-based educational design principles to create five pharmacy education scenarios.
Learners can diagnose peer learners' instructional implementation capabilities using a three-level scale with an instructor competency development assessment tool.
Learners can develop an operational manual to resolve three or more practical issues encountered in pharmacy education settings.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
